loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access the admin panel.
registerDescription: Create a new account for the appropriate role.
errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errorEmailInUse: This email address is already in use by another account.
errorWeakPassword: The password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters long.
schoolRegistrationSuccessDesc: The school '{{schoolName}}' and its administrator account have been created. You can now log in.
registerSchoolPageDescription: Set up your school on Report-Manager Lite and create the primary administrator account.
platformGoalEN: To provide a comprehensive, user-friendly, and multilingual platform for Rwandan schools (both general education and TVET) to efficiently manage student academic records, including marks, attendance, and behavior, ultimately simplifying the process of generating accurate and insightful report cards.
platformGoalFR: Fournir une plateforme complète, conviviale et multilingue pour les écoles rwandaises (enseignement général et EFTP) afin de gérer efficacement les dossiers académiques des élèves, y compris les notes, les présences et le comportement, simplifiant ainsi le processus de génération de bulletins de notes précis et perspicaces.
platformGoalRW: Gutanga urubuga rwuzuye, rworoshye gukoresha kandi rw'indimi nyinshi ku mashuri yo mu Rwanda (yaba ay'uburezi rusange na TVET) kugira ngo babe bashobora gucunga neza amakuru y'imyigire y'abanyeshuri, harimo amanota, kutitabira amasomo, n'imyitwarire, byoroshya uburyo bwo gukora raporo z'ukuri kandi zisobanutse.
featureGradeManagementDesc: Easily enter and calculate marks for continuous assessments and exams.
featureReportCardsDesc: Automatically generate comprehensive student report cards per term.
featureSmsEmailDesc: Send updates and report cards directly to parents and guardians.
featureAttendanceBehaviorDesc: Track student attendance and log disciplinary records and positive behavior.
featureTeacherStudentReportsDesc: Access detailed performance reports for classes, subjects, and individual students.
featureAssignmentsDesc: Manage and track student assignments and homework.
featurePhotosDocumentsDesc: Upload student photos and manage important documents.
featureCommunicationDesc: A central place for announcements and communication between staff.
feedbackPageDescription: We value your input! Please share any suggestions or issues you have.
feedbackSubmittedDesc: Thank you for your feedback! We appreciate you taking the time.
feedbackSubmissionFailedDesc: Could not submit your feedback. Please try again.
aiWelcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI assistant for Report-Manager Lite. As a {{role}}, I can help you with tasks like finding student information, checking on grades, or explaining features. How can I help you today?
aiErrorMessage: I'm sorry, I encountered an error. Please try asking again in a moment.
